sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {InfiniteScroll} from 'ngx-infinite-scroll'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { images = [ { url: './../../assets/images/carousel_slide1.jpg' }, { url: './../../assets/images/carousel_slide2.jpg' }, { url: './../../assets/images/carousel_slide3.jpg' }, ]; currentIndex = 0; ngOnInit() { setInterval(() => { this.next(); }, 2000); } next() { this.currentIndex++; if (this.currentIndex === this.images.length) { this.currentIndex = 0; } } prev() { this.currentIndex--; if (this.currentIndex < 0) { this.currentIndex = this.images.length - 1; } } }
